Uses of Package
essentials

Packages that use essentials
essentials   
 

Classes in essentials used by essentials
Mover
          The mover class controls the movements of the robot.
ObstacleDetector
          The obstacle detector controls all the ways the robot has to detect obstacles, namely the two touch sensors as well as the ultrasonic sensor.
ObstacleListener
          An interface for something that listens to the obstacle detector.
PolarPoint
           
Scanner
          The scanner has access to the entire rotating sensor apparatus, so as to allow us to control the entire apparatus and get many kinds of data from it, as opposed to needing the light sensors and the ultrasonic sensors to each take control of the motor.
